Author: riipurr
Content:
Now we sing of the forgotten king
To love, he'd offered his being
Now his legacy's merely debris
In ashes alone, his head still breathes

"Through thousand winters, my sole regret,
"It is to those whom I had failed to defend."

- Rii
- January 24, 2020
